section_title: Consultative Group of Experts on Non-Annex I National Communications (CGE)
sentences: This issue (FCCC/SBI/2012/2, FCCC/SBI/2012/12-14 and FCCC/SBI/2012/MISC.6) was first considered by the SBI plenary on 14 May. CGE Chair Ruleta Camacho (Antigua and Barbuda) reported on progress in implementing the CGE s work programme.
AOSIS and the African Group highlighted the need to extend the CGE s term at least until 2016 and said its mandate should encompass a number of roles.
The issue was then taken up in consultations co-facilitated by Julia Martinez and Kiyoto Tanabe.
